mapper.select: SELECT distinct ua.* FROM ams_role_user_ref aur LEFT JOIN ams_role_authority_ref ara on aur.role_id = ara.role_id LEFT JOIN ums_user ua on ua.id = ara.role_id WHERE ara.authority_id = #{authorityId} AND aur.id IS NOT NULL

SELECT DISTINCT aa.* FROM (SELECT DISTINCT aa.* FROM ams_authority aa LEFT JOIN ams_role_authority_ref arar ON arar.authority_id = aa.id LEFT JOIN ams_role_user_ref arur ON arur.role_id = arar.role_id LEFT JOIN ams_role ar ON ar.id = arar.role_id WHERE ar.enabled = 1 AND arur.user_id = #{userId} UNION SELECT DISTINCT aa.* FROM ams_authority aa LEFT JOIN ams_user_group_authority_ref augar ON augar.authority_id = aa.id LEFT JOIN ams_user_group_user_ref augur ON augur.user_group_id = augar.user_group_id LEFT JOIN ams_user_group aug ON aug.id = augur.user_group_id WHERE aug.enabled = 1 AND augur.user_id = #{userId}) aa
aa.enabled = 1
AND aa.project_id = #{projectId}
ORDER BY aa.priority
